text: My Wife's Relations is a 1922 American short comedy film directed by and starring Buster Keaton. Through a judicial error Buster finds himself married to a large domineering woman with an unfriendly father and four bullying brothers.https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0013422/?ref_=fn_al_tt_1 ==Cast== * Buster Keaton as The Husband * Monte Collins as The Father (uncredited) * Wheezer Dell as Brother (uncredited) * Harry Madison as Brother (uncredited) * Kate Price as Wife (uncredited) * Joe Roberts as Brother (uncredited) * Tom Wilson as Brother (uncredited) ==See also== * Buster Keaton filmography ==References== ==External links== * * * My Wife's Relations at the International Buster Keaton Society Category:1922 films Category:1922 short films Category:American films Category:American silent short films Category:American black-and-white films Category:American comedy films Category:Comedy short films Category:Films directed by Buster Keaton Category:Films produced by Joseph M. Schenck Category:Films with screenplays by Buster Keaton Category:Films directed by Edward F. Cline Category:1922 comedy films
title: My Wife's Relations
